name: GooglePlus Slimmer
description:
I like one-column, full-page-width view in G+. So, here's my version.
Updates will be coming when I have time to work my way through other displays, apart from main.
additional_info:
To use:
1. Change your G+ display to one column (last option under "More")
2. Apply this style

Created using User Style Manager and Firebug.
